channel.title: Gohugo on GDQuest
channel.description: Recent content in Gohugo on GDQuest

item.title: Hugo Tips: Concatenate paths with variables
item.author: nathan@gdquest.com (Nathan Lovato)
item.description: This tutorial is a post I initially wrote on the Hugo forums. Hugo is the static website generator that powers GDquest. It is a really flexible and elegant system, based on Google’s Go programming language. Sometimes, it is a bit hard to use for a non-tech-savvy user. So I decided to share some tips on things that got me stuck at some point. In a template, you sometimes need to load data from a path based on a parameter in your content fileâ€™s front matter.
